group_1.textLeft: Mm...[chara:200501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It smells delicious.
What will you two have?

group_1.textRight: So...
This is seriously your condition?

group_1.textLeft: It is.@If you want to fight me, well...
You will have a relaxing cup of tea with @me... That is the price you must pay.

group_1.textRight: A tea break...@...[chara:300801:motion_1:cheek_1]W-why...?

group_1.textLeft: Why not?
But if you need a reason...
Don't you think having a nice cup of tea@with someone is a nice way to spend time?

group_1.textRight: ...All right.@[chara:300501:cheek_-1:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]Let's see...
Excuse me? I would like to order.@One black tea for me too, please.
Um...Then I guess...@[chara:300801:motion_1:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]The same for me, please!
You don't need to order the same item as@us, if there's something else you prefer.
No, seriously...@I kinda wanna drink that too...
Akira.
Hehe...

group_1.textLeft: Akira...@You seem like a very kind person.

group_1.textRight: ...Excuse me?@I'm not so sure about that...

group_1.textLeft: I get the sense that you can't@ignore people who are in trouble.

group_1.textRight: Really?
I'm happy to hear that, but...
Isn't that just natural?
If there's someone who's counting on me...
Well, then... @It's only natural I'd want to help 'em.
That's just... @what you're supposed to do, right?

group_1.textLeft: It is not quite as clear-cut as that.@Actually, I think she is right.
You are an especially@kind Magical Girl, Akira.

group_1.textRight: H-hey...[chara:300801:cheek_1]What's all this all of a sudden?!@[chara:300801:motion_200]Cut it out...! [chara:300801:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]I'm getting embarrassed...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not saying it as a mere compliment.@[chara:300501:cheek_-1:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]It's more of a fact, proven by analysis.

group_1.textRight: Y-yeah...?
Then, [chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]I've got another provable fact for ya.
Nanaka is a natural-born strategist!

group_1.textLeft: Oh my, is that so?

group_1.textRight: Yes!@[chara:300801:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]Even in our little group...
She's always the one thinking up @the strategies and battle tactics.
What's more, she's really good at it.
Her plans always lead us straight down@the path to victory!

group_1.textLeft: That's [chara:200501:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]very impressive.

group_1.textRight: I am simply giving it my all to ensure@the victory of the group, nothing more.
Yeah, but by doing that you help all of @us out a bunch.
I'd actually say you were ranked higher than@me...[chara:300801:motion_1]when it comes to saving people, Nanaka.
...I've never considered it @from that perspective before...
Hehe.

group_1.textLeft: You two make a good team.

group_1.textRight: Do you think so?
Do we?@Even though we're kind of an odd couple.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think you're odd at all.@The two of you have a great rapport.
I actually worked alone until very recently.
I do have a team of my own now,[chara:200501:motion_0] but@still...I can't say I don't envy, well...
What you two have going for you.@Truthfully speaking, I am jealous.

group_1.textRight: ...How unexpected. To think you @would say something so kind…
…Geeze...@[chara:300801:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]You're making me blush.

group_1.textLeft: I mean it.@You two have a great bond.

group_1.narration: I wonder what kind of bond I have@with Madoka and the other girls?

group_1.textLeft: Mami!@Let's go take care of some Witches!

group_1.textRight: Need some backup fire over here!@Mami!

group_1.textLeft: Mami!@Th-thank you so much!

group_1.narration: Perhaps there is still some kind of @barrier between my heart and theirs...
I'm forcing myself to be their mentor.
I'm trying hard to continue to@be the reliable teacher to them.
Would it be okay to let them see my@more vulnerable side? Just a little?
After all...we are a team.@We are...friends...

group_1.textCenter: Yes, Mami!@[chara:200100:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]You can depend on us when things are tough!
